message:
2018-12-25

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/11/26/cnn10/ten-content-tues/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1811/27/sn.01.html

오늘은 동영상의 5분 이후에 나오는, 어떻게 이력서를 꾸미는 것이 좋은가? 에 대한 에피소드를 보시는 것을 추천합니다. 저 역시 정말 큰 도움이 되었어요.

Today we recommend you watch an episode of 'How do you like your resume?' which comes five minutes after the video. I was very helpful, too.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 02:45
Illegal Immigartion problem: a tense border crossing between Mexico and the U.S.

02:45 - 03:35
Almost contained California's wild fire

03:35 - 05:00
a tense strait between the Black Sea and the Sea of Azov.

05:00 - 08:50
How job seekers can make their resumes stand out in all the right ways.
